original: Nasaññojanañceva nasaññojanavippayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaññojano ceva nasaññojanavippayutto
analyzed: na saññojanam ca iva na saññojana vippayuttañca dhammam paṭicca na saññojanaḥ ca iva na saññojana vippayuttaḥ

original: ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasaññojanañceva nasaññojanavippayuttañca dhammaṁ
analyzed: ca dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na saññojanañca iva na saññojana vippayuttañca dhamma

original: paṭicca nasaññojanavippayutto ceva nanosaññojano ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: paṭicca na saññojana vippayuttaḥ ca iva na nosaññojanaḥ ca dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Nasaññojanañceva nasaññojanavippayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaññojano ceva nasaññojanavippayutto
analyzed: na saññojanam ca iva na saññojana vippayuttañca dhammam paṭicca na saññojanaḥ ca iva na saññojana vippayuttaḥ

original: ca nasaññojanavippayutto ceva nano ca saññojano ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
analyzed: ca na saññojana vippayuttaḥ ca iva na no ca saññojano ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā

original: Nasaññojanavippayuttañceva nano ca saññojanaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaññojanavippayutto
analyzed: na saññojana vippayuttam ca iva na no ca saññojanam dhammam paṭicca na saññojana vippayuttaḥ

original: ceva nano ca saññojano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasaññojanavippayuttañceva nano
analyzed: ca iva na no ca saññojanaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na saññojana vippayuttam ca iva na no

original: ca saññojanaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaññojano ceva nasaññojanavippayutto ca dhammo uppajjati
analyzed: ca saññojanam dhammam paṭicca na saññojanaḥ ca iva na saññojana vippayuttaḥ ca dhammaḥ uppajjati

original: hetupaccayā. Nasaññojanavippayuttañceva nano ca saññojanaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaññojano
analyzed: hetu paccayā na saññojana vippayuttam ca iva na no ca saññojanam dhammam paṭicca na saññojanaḥ

original: ceva nasaññojanavippayutto ca nasaññojanavippayutto ceva nano ca saññojano ca dhammā
analyzed: ca iva na saññojana vippayutto ca na saññojana vippayutto ca iva na no ca saññojano ca dhammā

original: Nasaññojanañceva nasaññojanavippayuttañca nasaññojanavippayuttañceva nano ca saññojanañca
analyzed: na saññojanañca iva na saññojana vippayuttañca na saññojana vippayuttañca iva na no ca saññojanañca

original: dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaññojano ceva nasaññojanavippayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā
analyzed: dhammam paṭicca na saññojanaḥ ca iva na saññojana vippayuttaḥ ca dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā
